Is a lexicographical ordering where additionally strings that are shorter precede longer strings.

== Examples ==

* The string order of all strings over the alphabet <math>\{ 0, 1 \}</math> is <math display="block">( \varepsilon, 0, 1, 00, 01, 10, 11, 000, \ldots)</math>
